#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int factorial(unsigned long long int);
int main(){
    int w;
    cin>>w;
    while(w--){
        unsigned long long int a,b,c,d,e;
        cin>>a>>b;
        c=(a*(a-1)*(a-2))/6;
        d=(b*(b-1)*(b-2))/6;
        e=c-d;
        //cout<<c<<' '<<d<<' '<<e<<' '<<endl;
        cout<<e<<endl;
        }
    return 0;
}
//unsigned long long int factorial(unsigned long long int x){
//    if(x==0)
//        return 1;
//    else return x*factorial(x-1);
//}
